vue-easy-lightbox/esc-disabled.description: By default, press the esc key to close Modal during presentation, default: false

vue-easy-lightbox/move-disabled.description: Pass true to disable image movement, default: false

vue-easy-lightbox/hide.description: When you click modal mask or close Btn, component will emit this event

vue-easy-lightbox/on-prev.description: Emit when prev btn is clicked or when user swiped right

vue-easy-lightbox/on-next.description: Emit when next btn is clicked or when user swiped left

vue-easy-lightbox/on-index-change.description: Emit when imgs's index is changed
